mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist the negro boy SPENCER aged about 34 years, meauring 5 feet 10 inches in height; he says he belongs to Mr. Paul Mélauçon, of the parish of St-James, and he speaks english and french. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, December 17th 1858. URSIN JACOB, Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
